# Bio

Hi! I'm Ryan Wang, a second-year master student studying biostatistics at [Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health](https://www.jhsph.edu).
I enjoy this field of study because I think biological theories can be better put into practice with the help of the rigor of statistics.

I am currently studying the application of time series in modeling the noise pattern of functional MRI data under the supervision of Dr. Martin Lindquist.
